id.description: A unique (internal) identifier for the mod.

source.description: The source of the mod (e.g. github).

owner.description: The name of the Github owner where the mod is hosted.

repo.description: The name of the repository where the mod is hosted.

load_first.description: Whether the dependency should be loaded first.

dependencies.description: List of dependencies for the trader.

load_after.description: List of mod ids that need to be loaded first.

filebase_url.description: The filebase download URL for the mod (for mods that don't use github).

google_drive_id.description: The Google file id for the mod (for mods that don't use github).
